text: Frank Torvald Baude (6 July 1936 – 4 February 2021) was a Swedish politician and bricklayer. He was chairman of the Communist Party Marxist-Leninists (the revolutionaries) from 1970 to 1998.Frank Baude om vägen till ett nytt revolutionärt parti, Proletären, 2007-06-20. He was born in Gothenburg, Sweden. Baude died in Gothenburg from a heart attack on 4 February 2021, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Gothenburg Category:Communist politicians
title: Frank Baude
